description: This file defines the UrlKnowledge class, which manages a list of URLs and provides both synchronous and asynchronous methods to retrieve documents from these URLs using a URLReader. It includes error handling and concurrency features.

classes.name: UrlKnowledge
classes.description: A class that manages a list of URLs and provides methods to retrieve documents synchronously and asynchronously.

methods.name: document_lists
methods.description: Synchronous generator property that iterates over URLs and yields lists of Document objects.

methods.name: async_document_lists
methods.description: Asynchronous generator property that concurrently fetches documents from all URLs and yields lists of Document objects.
